casebody.data:
ATHENS
v.
MCCLAIN 2019-0696 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 6, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

Appeal accepted on appellant City of Athens' proposition of law No. I. Kennedy, French, and Donnelly, JJ., would accept the appeal on all propositions of law. O'Connor, C.J., and DeWine, J., dissent.

APPEAL ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW
